name: Umbralex
story:
Morvain Umbralex, the master of shadow magic and divination, was the visionary behind House Umbralex at Arcane Academy. Known for his mysterious and nocturnal pursuits, Morvain's students excel in navigating the unseen realms and exploring the enigmas of the night.
Students here are drawn to the mysteries of the night and are skilled in shadow magic and divination. They excel in navigating the unseen.
